reviews.title: Flickering screen UNINSTALL
reviews.comment: I wondered why this has no reviews. It\'s utterly crap. Adds are all over the place. SICK OF BEING ASKED TO PLAY CANDY CRUSH SAGA EVERY 5 MINUTES
reviews.author: Katie Tuck
